parameter.name: vmArg
parameter.description: Specifies command-line arguments that are passed to the Java virtual machine that the operator runs within.

primitiveOp.name: JSONBeacon
primitiveOp.description: Generates JSON strings and submits as tuples

parameter.name: vmArg
parameter.description: Specifies command-line arguments that are passed to the Java virtual machine that the operator runs within.

parameter.name: initDelay
parameter.description: Delay in seconds before the operator starts producing tuples.

parameter.name: tagged
parameter.description: Prefix for property names to be tagged with the value of `tags`.

parameter.name: tags
parameter.description: Tags to set in `tags` output attribute when the property name starts with the value of `taggged`.

outputPort.description: Port requiring `name` and `value` attributes representing a system property. Optional `tags` attribute containing tags for the property

primitiveOp.name: AvroBeacon
primitiveOp.description: Produces Avro messages and submits BLOB tuples

parameter.name: vmArg
parameter.description: Specifies command-line arguments that are passed to the Java virtual machine that the operator runs within.

parameter.name: initDelay
parameter.description: Delay in seconds before the operator starts producing tuples.

parameter.name: tagged
parameter.description: Prefix for property names to be tagged with the value of `tags`.

parameter.name: tags
parameter.description: Tags to set in `tags` output attribute when the property name starts with the value of `taggged`.

outputPort.description: Port requiring `name` and `value` attributes representing a system property. Optional `tags` attribute containing tags for the property
